#include<iostream>
//#include<algorithm>
//#include<vector>
#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
const int mod=1e9+7;
using namespace std;
int A[102],B[102];
int dp[102][102];
// f(2,1)
// 2 3
// 1
int f(int x,int y)
{
//static int xnt=0; xnt++; cout<<xnt<<endl;
//cout<<"A[x]: "<<A[x]<<" ";\
cout<<"B[y]: "<<B[y]<<endl;
	if((!x)&&(!y)) return 0;
	if((!x)||(!y)) return (x?x:y);
	if(A[x]==B[y])
	{
		int v=dp[x-1][y-1];
		if (v==-1)		
			v=f(x-1,y-1);
		return dp[x][y]=v;
	}
	else
	{
		int v1=dp[x-1][y],v2=dp[x][y-1],
		v3=dp[x-1][y-1];
		//cout<<v1<<", "<<v2<<", "<<v3<<endl;
		if(v1==-1) v1=f(x-1,y);
		if(v2==-1) v2=f(x,y-1);
		if(v3==-1) v3=f(x-1,y-1);
		
		return dp[x][y]=min(v1+1,
		min(v2+1, v3+1) );
	}
}
int main()
{	
	int T; cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		for(int i=0;i<101;++i)
			for(int j=0;j<101;++j)
				dp[i][j]=-1;
		int N,M;		
		cin>>N;		
		for(int i=1;i<=N;++i)
			cin>>A[i];		
		cin>>M;
		for(int i=1;i<=M;++i)
			cin>>B[i];
		cout<<f(N,M)<<endl;
		/*f(N,M);
		cout<<dp[3][2]<<endl;
		cout<<dp[2][2]<<endl;
		cout<<dp[1][2]<<endl;
		cout<<dp[1][1]<<endl;
		cout<<dp[3][1]<<endl;
		cout<<dp[2][1]<<endl;*/
	}
return 0;
}
